summary: A young woman forced into servitude by her step-family gets a chance to attend the royal ball.
cast: Yanina Zheymo|Aleksey Konsovskiy|Erast Garin|Faina Ranevskaya|Yelena Yunger|Tatyana Sezenyovskaya|Vasiliy Merkurev|Aleksandr Rumnev|Varvara Myasnikova|Igor Klemenkov|Sergey Filippov
title: Cenicienta
